actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to declare a portion of the Appomattox River, Virginia, to be not navigable water within the meaning of the Constitution and laws of the United States.

summary.text: Declares a portion of the Appomattox River, Virginia, not to be: (1) navigable water within the meaning of the Constitution and laws of the United States; and (2) water affecting navigable waters of the United States or interstate or foreign commerce.

titles.title: A bill to declare a portion of the Appomattox River, Virginia, to be not navigable water within the meaning of the Constitution and laws of the United States.
